relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented x3, pleasant, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Mucous membranes moist, extraocular movements intact.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Clear to auscultation bilaterally with faint crackles over left mid-lung, no increased work of breathing, no respiratory difficulty, no tachypnea.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, hypoactive bowel sounds, unable to assess hepatosplenomegaly.
